message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it!
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $130?
I understand your budget constraints, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we settle on a price of $140?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, $140 is still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $130 again?
I'm not willing to go back to $130, Bob. However, I'm willing to make a slightly more competitive offer. How about we meet at $135?
I appreciate your willingness to make a more competitive offer, Alice. However, $135 is still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $125?
I'm not willing to go down to $125, Bob. However, I'm willing to make one more offer. How about we meet at $132?
